subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games (2010)
Olympic Games (2006)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Jacobellis, who won her third straight Winter X Games snowboard cross title, has a chance to alter her image as the showboat who fell at the 2006 Olympics.
snippet: Lindsey Jacobellis, who won her third straight Winter X Games snowboard cross title, has a chance to alter her image as the showboat who fell at the 2006 Olympics.
